text: Mimoricopis rufescens is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Mimoricopis. It was described by Breuning in 1969.Biolib.cz - Mimoricopis rufescens. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1969 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Mimoricopis
